name: middle-coast-website
description: Static investor website for Middle Coast - a Midwest real estate investment firm. Built with Astro for simplicity and future extensibility.

scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Please install the Astro extension in VS Code if not already installed: astro-build.astro-vscode'
scripts.check-extensions: echo 'Required VS Code extensions:' && echo '- Astro (astro-build.astro-vscode)' && echo '- Tailwind CSS IntelliSense (bradlc.vscode-tailwindcss)' && echo '- Prettier (esbenp.prettier-vscode)'
